numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
2. I notice that the percentage of players of color is higher than the percentage of head coaches of color.
3. I wonder why there are not many head coaches of color.
4. There are many players of color.
5. This situation does not have a big impact on me.
6. This situation does not have a big impact on my community.
7. I do not see people of any color as different from other people.
8. I think that everyone is the same.
9. In my community, people judge other people by how they act.
10. In my community, people judge other people by how they treat other people.
11. In my community, people do not judge other people by their skin color.
12. The graph shows percentages of people of color.
13. The graph compares players of a sport with head coaches of that sport.
14. The headline is: The Diversity Between Players and Coaches.
